properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 23 at 2:38AM PST until January 25 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 7 to 12 feet at 19 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras
Blancas California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 AM Friday to 3 AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM FRIDAY TO 3 AM PST SATURDAY
